title: A/L practical exams from March 29th
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Examinations announced that the practical examinations for the 2021 G.C.E Advanced Level Examination will be held from March 29 to April 08, 2022.
The Commissioner General of Examinations L.M.D Dharmasena noted that the practical tests will be conducted on local and Indian dances, Eastern, Karnataka, and Western music subjects.
The tests will be conducted at Practical Testing Centers set up islandwide.
The Commissioner of Examinations also stated that the admission cards required to appear for the examination have been sent by post.
He said that if a candidate does NOT have an admission card, students can obtain it by visiting the doenets.lk website of the Department of Examinations.
Candidates who have any problems can obtain information by calling the numbers of the Department of Examinations.
The Commissioner of Examinations also requested students who are preparing to sit for practical examinations to inform the Department of Examinations if they have been affected by COVID-19.
He said that the relevant students could be given another date to appear for the examination.
